sys_script_include.name: validateEmailAddress

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b58d7db0471db1106e504aff336d430b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1025229_test_v_0.validateEmailAddress</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>validateEmailAddress</name><script><![CDATA[// var validateEmailAddress = Class.create();
// validateEmailAddress.prototype = {
//     initialize: function() {
//     },

//     type: 'validateEmailAddress'
// };

function validateEmailAddress(emailStr){
    // Use JavaScript coercion to guarantee emailStr is a string
    emailStr = emailStr + '';
    // Compare emailStr against the allowed syntax as specified in the regular expression
    // If emailStr has allowed syntax, return true, else return false
    if(emailStr.match(/^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/)){
        return true;
    }
    else return false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-13 04:39:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>b58d7db0471db1106e504aff336d430b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validateEmailAddress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Test Validation" source="x_1025229_test_v_0">cb684b28475571106e504aff336d435b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Test Validation">cb684b28475571106e504aff336d435b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b58d7db0471db1106e504aff336d430b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-13 05:40:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
